text: Zgierz is a town in Łódź Voivodeship in central Poland. In 2021, 54,974 people lived there. Its area is 42.33 km². It is on the river Bzura. Zgierz is one of the oldest cities in central Poland. It was first mentioned in 1231. It bought its town rights before 1288. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Łódź Voivodeship
title: Zgierz
